name: Asepto Syringe
specifications: Medical-grade plastic; bulb-type barrel; 60 mL capacity; smooth plunger; total length approx. 18â€“20 cm.
function: Used for wound irrigation, aspiration of fluids, and administration of medication in larger volumes.
usage: Wear gloves; confirm sterility before use; draw solution into syringe; attach irrigation tip if needed; apply gentle pressure for controlled irrigation.
maintenance: Use only sterile syringes; avoid excessive pressure during irrigation; dispose properly after single use.
warning: Reuse of disposable syringes or using too much force, which can damage tissue.
